name: Hoppy Harry Demo
description:
Thanks For Clicking On The Page, This Is My First Attempt At Making A Game And I Released A Small Demo. I'm Looking For Some Criticism From The Community So I Can Improve And Adapt My Game Making For Future Titles.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome To Hoppy Harry, In This Game You Are Harry, A Creature Tasked To Retrieve The Fallen Stars That Have Mysteriously Crashed Down To Earth And Return Them To The The Queen Of The Stars Before Nightfall.

Controls For Menu;
W, S: Up & Down Movement
Spacebar: Select

Controls For Game:
A, D: Left & Right Movement
Spacebar: Small Jump
Hold Spacebar: Big Jump
E: Interact
P: Pause
